sourceDesc.bibl: St. Mary’s of the Lake Church (Watkins Glen, New York, USA), Marriages 1849-1869 (manuscript copy), unnumbered pages, unnumbered entries in chronological order, pp. [8–9]; digital images, FamilySearch ( : 29 Sep 2018), FHL microfilm 1,432,401, DGS 7857668, image 194 of 1067.

correction.p: OCR generated transcript has not been corrected.

normalization.p: Only minor normalization where needed, if any, is indicated via markup.

punctuation.p: All punctuation marks in the source text have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.
Punctuation may be marked up with pc elements for clarification, but not exclusively.

quotation.p: All quotation marks have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.

hyphenation.p: Hyphenated words that appear at the end of a line have been retained. The hyphen, if present, is represented by the Unicode code point, and marked up with a pc element. The break="no" attribute on the lb element indicates that a single word is split across the lines.

interpretation.p: Dates, places, and names may be marked up, where useful.

ab.head:
William McLaughlin
et Margaret Doherty
Januarii 1. 1861.
ab.ab:
Omissis tribus denuntiationibus ex facultate a
Cancellario accetpta Confunti in Matrimonio
Gulielimum filium Jacobi McLaughlin et Honorae
Doherty et Margarettam filiam Georgii Doherty
Testos juere Joanes Brown et Elizabeth McLaughlin.
J McKenna.

ab.head:
Charles ONeil
et Anne McLaughlin.
Jan. 1. 1861.
ab.ab:
Omissis tribus denuntiationibus ex facultate
a Cancellario accepta Confunti in Matrimonio
Carolum filium Hugenis ONeil et Ellenum Mc
Brone et Annum filiam Jacobi McLaughlin
et Honorae Doherty. Testos juere Jacobus Caghlan
et Birgitta OKeefe.
J McKenna.
